cs.man.ac.uk.tree.nodes

Class ActiveLearningNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs.man.ac.uk.tree.nodes.Node
      • cs.man.ac.uk.tree.nodes.LearningNode
        • cs.man.ac.uk.tree.nodes.ActiveLearningNode

  • public class ActiveLearningNode
extends LearningNode
    The main learning node object within the GHVFDT.
    Author:
    Richard Kirkby (rkirkby@cs.waikato.ac.nz), Rob Lyon

    • Method Detail

      • getWeightSeen

        public double getWeightSeen()
        Returns:
        the weight of examples seen at this node (weight is 1.0 per example).

      • getWeightSeenAtLastSplitEvaluation

        public double getWeightSeenAtLastSplitEvaluation()
        Returns:
        the weight observed since a split at this node was last considered, if this is greater than the grace period then a split will be attempted.

      • setWeightSeenAtLastSplitEvaluation

        public void setWeightSeenAtLastSplitEvaluation(double weight)
        Parameters:
        weight - sets the weight seen since a split at this node was last considered.

                              GHVFDT ht)
        Description copied from class: LearningNode
        Attempts to learn from the supplied instance.
        Specified by:
        learnFromInstance in class LearningNode
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to learn from.
        ht - the tree the node belongs to.

      • getBestSplitSuggestions

        public AttributeSplitSuggestion[] getBestSplitSuggestions(SplitCriterion criterion,
                                                          GHVFDT ht)
        Gets the best split point suggestions at this node.
        Parameters:
        criterion - the split criterion used ( Hellinger distance).
        ht - the GHVFDT this node belongs to.
        Returns:
        an array of split point suggestions, if there are any.
